abilities.name: Shadow Curse
abilities.effect: If Gengar would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cursed Reaction
attacks.effect: Put 2 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. If Gengar has any React Energy cards attached to it, put 4 damage counters instead.
